name: Orc Castle
description:
Orc Castle

Welcome to my first platformer Orc Castle. This is my final project submission for Issues in Game Studies: Survival Horror. In this game, players will find themselves in a castle taken over by Orcs that must be defeated to make it out alive.

Please keep in mind that this is merely a prototype and that pieces of the game are missing or may not be fully functional. 

Controls
  • Movement: WASD or arrow keys
  • Small Jump: Tap Spacebar
  • High Jump: Hold Spacebar
  • Fireball: F
  • Sword: Left Mouse
  • Menu: Escape
  • Menu Interaction: WASD or arrow keys to move. E or Enter to interact
To Do:

There are a few features that still need to be implemented or I wish to implement. Over the next weeks I hope to implement these.  Here is a list of these features:

  1.  Fall damage
  2.  Ranged enemies
  3.  Breakaway platforms
  4.  Fireball cooldown HUD
  5.  Switch to tilemap for level design
Known Bugs:

There are a few bugs in this game that may cause the experience to not be optimal. 

  1.  In room 7 there is a bug where you may not die when falling through the floor from a certain height. The only recourse is to restart the game.
  2.  When a firetrap is active and you leave the room and rejoin, it may not exit the triggered state and will thus not work anymore. Restart to fix this.
